Message:
At that moment,
I’d forgotten all about the legend.

Maybe, when I noticed I could
use this thing as a weapon,
I just picked it up
without thinking...

Looking back, though,
my body was definitely
moving on its own.

One creature leaps forward,
but I swing the sword
in one fell strike.

The creature’s body slams
against a tree, and its head
rolls along the ground.

I stand to my feet,
sword at the ready.
Two enemies left...

I’d never held a sword in my life,
but I knew exactly what
my next move should be.

Then, when all the creatures
were defeated, I found myself
covered head to toe in armor...

I’m usually slow,
but even I realized
what’d happened.
